title: Food Sharing App
overview: A full-stack food sharing platform where users can donate and request leftover food. Built with modern web technologies for seamless and secure interaction.
notes: Users can post, request, and manage food donations.
Authentication and role-based access using Firebase.
Backend secured with JWT and data stored in MongoDB.

title: Movie Portal
overview: A responsive movie portal allowing users to browse, favorite, and review movies with authentication and admin dashboard.
notes: Admins can add, edit, and delete movies.
Favorites and movie reviews stored in MongoDB with secure API.
